> 
> Moreover, according to the "opaqueness", a user can't guess 
> the URI /parts/00345, and MUST access it through a hyperlink, whereas
> parts?part-id=00345 can be created by a form, which provides 
> the "semantic" of the link, and so how to construct it.
Well, there are probably several URI construction mechanisms above HTML
Forms that would allow "/parts/00345" to be constructed - it's an accident
of implementation that it isn't supported today.
